reviews.review_msg: She's very confusing and at times rude to students.
Completely useless prof and waste of money. Teaches nothing during class and is also impossible to reach outside of class. The entire class is spent on talking about current events

wow, such a great teacher. Knowledgeable and amazing personality. I wish SFU has hired more of people like him rather than Jan Simon. He knows every branch of finance in depth and more importantly he knows how to transfer his knowledge. Of course you need to know a bit of mathematics, otherwise you be like those who rate him low here.

He is very knowledgeable. The course is tough and if students don't have statistic background it is even more challenging. However he really make it simple and he explain stuff very well. It was a business course and there were many international student without knowing anything about Mathematics, for those it was really tough. He is A++++++
Well, Avoid him if you can.  Just goes through the motion - absolutely no value added by his lectures.  I think he realizes it too.  Thats why his exams are ridiculously simple.
Unclear and unprepare.  Change his minds all the times.  Don't take his course if you have low tolerance for ambiguity!
